name: Belton Pirates' Magic Head - Happy Administrative Assistant's Day!
name_original: Belton Pirates' Magic Head - Happy Administrative Assistant's Day!
description:
Happy Administrative Assistant's Day, Belton High School!  

Huge thank you for all you do from the Belton Cyber Pirates Robotics Team!

The first time you load the game it may take a while.  You can play it in a browser... that is not on the school wifi.  It will play on phones, but works better on Androids...

To Play:

Avoid those sharp Belton Blades!

Tap anywhere to jump!

... and if it gives an error... just click OK!
